title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, distributed on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models, packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI tool with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that connects GitHub Copilot-style completions to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into Discord channels.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summarization & generation via Ollama.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama, published to nimble.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI-based LLM testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with both synchronous and async APIs, distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that forwards Slack messages to Ollama and streams replies back.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for managing and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.
